trans-unit.source: Open a web browser and browse to [http://www.windowsazure.com][].
trans-unit.target: Open a web browser and browse to [http://www.windowsazure.com][].

trans-unit.source: To get started with a free account, click **Free Trial** in the upper-right corner and follow the steps.
trans-unit.target: To get started with a free account, click **Free Trial** in the upper-right corner and follow the steps.

trans-unit.source: You'll need a credit card number and a mobile phone number for proof of identity, but you will not be billed.
trans-unit.target: You'll need a credit card number and a mobile phone number for proof of identity, but you will not be billed.
